title: AI Development Foundations
description: Master the universal foundations of AI-native development. Understand MCP, context management, and security principles that apply to ANY AI coding tool.
description_cs: Ovládněte univerzální základy AI-native vývoje. Pochopte MCP, správu kontextu a bezpečnostní principy které platí pro JAKÝKOLI AI kódovací nástroj.
learning_objectives: Understand the AI-native development paradigm (shift from code writer to agent director)
Master MCP as the universal protocol for AI tool integration
Apply context management principles that work across ANY AI IDE
Use the IDE selection framework to choose the right tool for each task
Build a custom MCP server that extends AI capabilities
Implement security fundamentals for AI agents (least privilege, sandboxing, HITL)
